Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Relates to charter schools in cities with a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires the state comptroller and the comptroller of the city of New York to coordinate the scheduling and performance of audits of charter schools in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to charter schools in cities with a population of one million or more
